poem:
### Secrets Behind Screens

In the flicker of screens,  
naked truths lie;  
the votes cast in quiet,  
polite nods slipping  
past glass windows,  
hidden reveries shared  
by faithful dogs,  
and solitary cats—all  
telling tales of lives  
woven with frailty's  
thread, where secrets  
are but shadows  
dancing in the  
glow of electric light.
